CustomField.description: This field is only used as a placeholder on certain charts, so that the correct automatic colors will be used for other fields that we actually want to report on. Don't enter anything in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is only used as a placeholder on certain charts, so that the correct automatic colors will be used for other fields that we actually want to report on. Don't enter anything in this field.
CustomField.label: Currency Placeholder 1
